title: FARM SCHOOL: How to Do Sucessfully Farming In Africa "Simple Techniques"

tasks.task: Tasks related to investing in agriculture while abroad.
subtasks: Choose a type of farming based on interest and capability.
Obtain knowledge about the chosen farming method, even if far from the farm.
Familiarize oneself with the entire process of growing crops (e.g., maize) through research or education.
Ensure adequate knowledge and expertise in farm management, even if not physically present.
Invest in good farming practices and quality inputs to avoid losses.
Plan market strategies, including identifying customers, ensuring timely product delivery, and understanding sales channels.
